flawed_nl_solution:
After going on vacation, Grandpa has 100 * 36 = <<100*36=3060>>3060 tomatoes.
So in his absence, 3060 - 36 = <<3060-36=3024>>3024 tomatoes have grown.
#### 3024

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3600, not 3060. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
